question: who starred in the pirates of the caribbean
vanilla_rag_result:
The main cast of "Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales" includes:

- Johnny Depp as Captain Jack Sparrow
- Geoffrey Rush as Captain Hector Barbossa
- Kevin McNally as Joshamee Gibbs
- Javier Bardem as the undead sea captain
- Brenton Thwaites
- Kaya Scodelario

These actors reprise their roles or join the cast in this fifth installment of the "Pirates of the Caribbean" film series.
